TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LoggingEventSource extends System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource
Public NotInheritable Class LoggingEventSource Inherits EventSource
public ref class LoggingEventSource sealed : System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventSource

summary.span: LoggingEventSource 是连接所有基于 ILogger 的日志记录和 EventSource/EventListener 日志记录的桥。

span.span: The LoggingEventSource is the bridge from all ILogger based logging to EventSource/EventListener logging.

summary.span: 启用以下名称的 EventSource 即可启用此日志记录

span.span: You turn this logging on by enabling the EventSource called

summary.span: Microsoft-Extensions-Logging

span.span: Microsoft-Extensions-Logging

summary.span: 启用 EventSource 后，你设置的 EventLevel 将以明显的方式转换为与 ILogger 关联的级别（因此 Debug = verbose、Informational = Informational ...Critical == Critical）

span.span: When you enabled the EventSource, the EventLevel you set is translated in the obvious way to the level associated with the ILogger (thus Debug = verbose, Informational = Informational ... Critical == Critical)

summary.span: 这使你可以通过简单的方式按事件级别进行筛选。

span.span: This allows you to filter by event level in a straightforward way.

summary.span: 为了更好地进行控制，可以指定以下名称的 EventSource 参数

span.span: For finer control you can specify a EventSource Argument called

summary.span: FilterSpecs

span.span: FilterSpecs

summary.span: FilterSpecs 参数是以分号分隔的规范列表。

span.span: The FilterSpecs argument is a semicolon separated list of specifications.

summary.span: 其中每个规范都为

span.span: Where each specification is

summary.span: SPEC = // 空规范，与 \* 相同 | NAME // 只是名称，级别为默认级别 | NAME :LEVEL // 指定特定记录器的级别（可以有 \* 后缀）。

span.span: SPEC = // empty spec, same as \* | NAME // Just a name the level is the default level | NAME : LEVEL // specifies level for a particular logger (can have a \* suffix).

summary.span: 其中 Name 是 ILoggger 的名称（区分大小写），Name 可以有 \*，以后缀形式充当通配符。

span.span: Where Name is the name of a ILoggger (case matters), Name can have a \* which acts as a wildcard AS A SUFFIX.

summary.span: 因此 Net\* 将匹配以“Net”开头的所有记录器。

span.span: Thus Net\* will match any loggers that start with the 'Net'.

summary.span: LEVEL 为数字或 LogLevel 字符串。

span.span: The LEVEL is a number or a LogLevel string.

summary.span: 0 = 跟踪，1 = 调试，2 = 信息，3 = 警告，4 = 错误，严重 = 5，指定关联模式的级别。

span.span: 0=Trace, 1=Debug, 2=Information, 3=Warning, 4=Error, Critical=5 This specifies the level for the associated pattern.

summary.span: 如果未指定数字（规范的第一种形式），则为 EventSource 的默认级别。

span.span: If the number is not specified, (first form of the specification) it is the default level for the EventSource.

summary.span: 如果某个特定名称与多个模式匹配，则使用第一个匹配项。

span.span: First match is used if a particular name matches more than one pattern.

summary.span: 除了 level 和 FilterSpec 参数，还可以设置 EventSource 关键字。

span.span: In addition the level and FilterSpec argument, you can also set EventSource Keywords.

summary.span: 请参阅下面的关键字定义，但基本上你可决定是否要使用该关键字

span.span: See the Keywords definition below, but basically you get to decide if you wish to have

summary.span: \* Keywords.Message - 获取的事件所具有的数据采用已解析形式。

span.span: \* Keywords.Message - You get the event with the data in parsed form.

summary.span: \* Keywords.JsonMessage - 获取的事件所具有的数据采用已解析形式，但采用 JSON blob 的形式（未被参数破坏 ...）\* Keywords.FormattedMessage - 获取的事件所具有的数据设置为字符串格式

span.span: \* Keywords.JsonMessage - you get an event with the data in parse form but as a JSON blob (not broken up by argument ...) \* Keywords.FormattedMessage - you get an event with the data formatted as a string

summary.span: 你应一次只启用其中一个关键字，但可将其全部启用（并以三种不同的方式记录相同的数据）。

span.span: It is expected that you will turn only one of these keywords on at a time, but you can turn them all on (and get the same data logged three different ways.

summary.span: 示例用法

span.span: Example Usage

summary.span: 此示例演示如何使用 EventListener 获取 ILogging 信息

span.span: This example shows how to use an EventListener to get ILogging information

summary.span: class MyEventListener :EventListener { protected override void OnEventSourceCreated(EventSource eventSource) { if (eventSource.Name == "Microsoft-Extensions-Logging") { // 初始化字符串、要传递到 EventSource 的参数的字符串字典。

span.span: class MyEventListener : EventListener { protected override void OnEventSourceCreated(EventSource eventSource) { if (eventSource.Name == "Microsoft-Extensions-Logging") { // initialize a string, string dictionary of arguments to pass to the EventSource.

summary.span: // 启用记录器，匹配 App\* 与 Information，其他内容 (*) 都是默认级别（即 EventLevel.Error）var args = new Dictionary<string, string>() { { "FilterSpecs", "App*:Information;\*" } }; // 将默认级别（详细信息）设置为 Error，并且在这种情况下仅要求格式化消息。

span.span: // Turn on loggers matching App\* to Information, everything else (*) is the default level (which is EventLevel.Error) var args = new Dictionary<string, string>() { { "FilterSpecs", "App*:Information;\*" } }; // Set the default level (verbosity) to Error, and only ask for the formatted messages in this case.

summary.span: EnableEvents(eventSource, EventLevel.Error, LoggingEventSource.Keywords.FormattedMessage, args); } } protected override void OnEventWritten(EventWrittenEventArgs eventData) { // 查找格式化消息事件，该事件具有以下参数布局（在 LoggingEventSource 中定义）。

span.span: EnableEvents(eventSource, EventLevel.Error, LoggingEventSource.Keywords.FormattedMessage, args); } } protected override void OnEventWritten(EventWrittenEventArgs eventData) { // Look for the formatted message event, which has the following argument layout (as defined in the LoggingEventSource.

summary.span: // FormattedMessage(LogLevel Level, int FactoryID, string LoggerName, string EventId, string FormattedMessage); if (eventData.EventName == "FormattedMessage") Console.WriteLine("Logger {0}: {1}", eventData.Payload[2], eventData.Payload[4]); } }

span.span: // FormattedMessage(LogLevel Level, int FactoryID, string LoggerName, string EventId, string FormattedMessage); if (eventData.EventName == "FormattedMessage") Console.WriteLine("Logger {0}: {1}", eventData.Payload[2], eventData.Payload[4]); } }

Protected Overrides Sub OnEventCommand (command As EventCommandEventArgs)
